scripts.dev: npx ts-node --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --project tsconfig.json node_modules/webpack-cli/bin/cli.js serve --mode development --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build: npx ts-node --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --project tsconfig.json node_modules/webpack-cli/bin/cli.js --mode production --config webpack.config.js
